items.content_html: A blazing-fast, lightweight boilerplate for building cross-platform desktop applications using Electron, Vite, and React. Say goodbye to the sluggish create-react-app setup and experience faster builds, instant hot-reloading, and optimized performance. Free to use and designed for developers who value speed and efficiency. üöÄ
